titleStmt.title: By the Quene. Where the auncient entercourse of marchaundizes betwixt our countries and the lowe countries of the kyng of Spayne our good brother, hath ben of late interrupted by sundrye prohibitions made in the sayde lowe countries ...
Proclamations. 1564-03-23
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1558-1603 : Elizabeth I)

publicationStmt.publisher: Imprinted by Richard Iugge and Iohn Cawood, Printers to the Quenes Maiestie,

notesStmt.note: A proclamation allowing export of clothing except to the Low Countries.
At foot of sheet 1: Cum priuilegio Regiæ Maiestatis.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
